data: “Here is Mr. Cashel; here he is!” exclaimed a number of voices, as Roland, with a heart full of indignant anger, ascended the terrace upon which the great drawing-room opened, and at every window of which stood groups of his gay company.
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
